dcterms:creator: R. A. Martin
P. Puhlik-Doris
G. Larsen
J. Gray
K. Weir
dcterms:description: The Passau Spontaneous Football Coach Humor (Passau-SFCH) dataset contains audio-visual recordings of German football coaches, labelled for the presence of humour. It features press conference recordings of 10 German Bundesliga football coaches, recorded between August 2017 and November 2017, with a total of about 18 hours of video.
dcterms:title: Passau Spontaneous Football Coach Humor (Passau-SFCH)

dcterms:creator: A. S. Cowen
D. Keltner
dcterms:description: The Hume-Reaction dataset consists of emotional reactions of individuals to emotional stimuli, annotated with respect to seven emotional expression intensities. It includes over 70 hours of audio and video data from 2,222 subjects reacting to a wide range of emotionally evocative videos.
dcterms:title: Hume-Reaction

dcterms:creator: C. Kirschbaum
K.-M. Pirke
D. H. Hellhammer
dcterms:description: The Ulm-Trier Social Stress Test (Ulm-TSST) dataset comprises audio-visual data labelled with continuous emotion values (arousal and valence) of individuals in a stress-inducing scenario following the Trier Social Stress Test protocol. It includes recordings of subjects during a simulated job interview.
dcterms:title: Ulm-Trier Social Stress Test (Ulm-TSST)
